title: Tile, ca. 1770
description: Vertical rectangle, Time from a stove, with flanges of back broken off. Decorated with checkered squares diagonally placed, with hatching running in alternating directions, in green; rococo cartouche outlined with manganese violet scrolls, with reverse, in centre of which is a spray of yellow, blue and violet roses with green foliage.

tombstone.epitaph: Tile, ca. 1770.Tin-enamelled earthenware, underglaze polychrome decoration. Gift of Mrs. Montgomery Hare. 1936-29-2.
